resources.string: Bem-vindo ao applicativo de equacões VIOPE!
Press start to play the game
Sales tax = price of item × tax rate
Interest = principal × rate of interest × time
Tips = cost of meals × tip rate
Commission = cost of service × commission rate
Original price of a pair of shoes is 159 R$ before discount. Shoes are on sale -60 R$. How much does the shoes cost after the discount?
Hint: List price is 159 R$. Discount is 60 R$.
Phonecases original price are 19 R$. They are on sale -25%. What is the price after the discount?
Hint: List price is 19 R$. Discount rate is 25%.
A phone costs 999 R$. It was bought on sale for 699 R$. What is the discount rate?
Hint: Discount is 999 R$ - 699 R$ = 300 R$. List price is 999 R$.
Enter your name or student number \nAnd press upload
